mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, CREATE_TIME FROM TB_BOARD WHERE USED = 'Y';
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = now() WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD (CREATER, TITLE, CONTENTS) VALUE (#{idx}, #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET USED = 'N' WHERE IDX = #{idx}
